items.sentence: The umbrella that I bought in Australia is this one.
It's the middle of the night. Why aren't you asleep?
Which are you better at speaking, French or English?
Which is easier for you to speak, French or English?
Tom really enjoys talking about himself, doesn't he?
Your face is familiar, but I can't recall your name.
Tom is wearing a new shirt that he bought yesterday.
Tom spent the summer vacation with his grandparents.
Tom spends a lot of money on things he doesn't need.
I spend a couple of hours every day studying French.
I don't really want to spend much more time on this.
In your opinion, which bottle of wine tasted better?
What made you think that Tom didn't want to do that?
I thought that Tom wouldn't be there, and he wasn't.
Tom, I'm going shopping. Stay here until I get back.
I thought we wouldn't get there on time, but we did.
I eat chocolate even though I know that I shouldn't.
Tom didn't notice that Mary had gotten her hair cut.
That's not the main reason why Tom needs to do that.
I speak a little French, but I'm not good at it yet.
I haven't read this story and neither has my sister.
I was hoping you'd tell me what you wanted me to do.
I could agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong.
I have to go now. Did you see where I put my things?
I need an answer from you before the end of the day.
I don't want to think about anything else right now.
I envy your lifestyle - living day-to-day like that.
I talked to my advisors about which classes to take.
Tom made enough money over the summer to buy a bike.
I think everybody here knows that Tom can't do that.
Both Tom and Mary can speak French better than John.
Tom tried to do that same thing that Mary was doing.
Tom started doing that when he was thirty years old.
Tom and his wife are coming over for dinner tonight.
Tom is working hard to catch up with his classmates.
Tom is wearing the same clothes he had on yesterday.
Tom is wearing the new sneakers he bought last week.
Tom is very likely to know what he's supposed to do.
Tom is the most likely to be the first person there.
Tom is talking about going to Australia next winter.
Tom is sure that he'll be able to pass today's exam.
Tom is outside waiting for Mary to come pick him up.
Tom is going to have to tell Mary about what he did.
Tom is going to graduate from high school this year.
Tom hasn't yet been paid for the work he did for us.
Tom has never told me anything about his girlfriend.
Tom and three other people were here this afternoon.
I know you see it, but are you really looking at it?
I'm fairly certain that what we saw was an elephant.
I'm glad that Tom finally found himself a good home.
